# Introduction

-   Low recruitment pattern on Winter spawners ![](images/TimeSeries/spawningseason.png){fig-align="center" width="800" height="600"}

## Data used for spatial-temporal analyses

-   Preliminary results 1998-2021

-   Merged Satellite Chrolophyll from Copernicus (SeaWiFS, MODIS, MERIS, VIIRS-SNPP & JPSS1, OLCI-S3A & S3B)

-   Mercator Glorys Model Reanalyses (8km resolution)

    -   SST
    -   Bottom Temperature
    -   Surface Salinity
    -   Depth Mixed Layer

## EOF analyses

-   Sensitivity around the study area and time resolution.
-   **Study area:**
    -   currently bounded at Cape Canaveral (\~28.5ºN) and Cape Hatteras (\~35ºN) from shore to the 500m isobath
-   **Time:**
    -   Monthly Averaged time series for 1998-2020
    -   Seasonally Averaged (Winter - JFM, Spring - AMJ, Summer - JAS, Fall - OND)
    -   Spawning Seasonal Averages - Winter: FMA, Summer: JJA
